author: lektran
msg: Changed all test suites (where appropriate) containing simple method tests to use the new location only definition so that all tests from a given simple methods document are automatically included
Required changing the names of a couple of inline methods in PartyTests.xml

author: gtully
msg: svn merge -c 893661 - last piece of https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-2540 - fix order or audit recovery replay

author: lektran
msg: Removed ProductTest.xml, it only contained tests that were already present in FacilityTest.xml

author: lektran
msg: Added the ability to include all tests from a given simple method document in a test suite by only specifying the location and not the method name.  All simple methods with a method name beginning with "test" will be included and will be executed in the order present in the document.  Example usage:
Basically just mimics the behavior of the junit-test-suite tag but for simple method tests
